jobs.description_preview: Manage on-site software service delivery, ensuring customer satisfaction through technical support, relationship building, and proactive problem-solving while leveraging advance...
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Family Definition:
Within the family there is a range of technical and managerial customer on-site functions. The family of jobs is focused on managing the onsite delivering of software services, pre-sales, post-sales or service delivery support, installation and configuration for customer environments. The jobs solve various business systems, networking and applications problems for standard industry servers, specialized or complex clustered environments. Deliver reactive and proactive activities according to Service Level Agreement to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty. Provides direct post-sales systems on site technical support for reactive and proactive customers. Each position maintains a high level of customer satisfaction by ensuring clear business and technical solution alignment, clarifying customer needs and ensuring that they are met. Jobs are responsible for company Total Customer Experience as well as the revenue growth, profitability, and account retention.
Management Level Definition:
Applies developed subject matter knowledge to solve common and complex business issues and recommends appropriate alternatives. Works on problems of diverse complexity and scope. May act as a team or project leader providing direction to team activities and facilitates information validation and team decision making process. Exercises independent judgment to identify and select a solution. Ability to handle most unique situations. May seek advice in order to make decisions on complex business issues.
Responsibilities:
Apply advanced technical knowledge to operate one or more technology areas (e.g. server administration, technical security management, performance management) or customer groups that are critical or high- risk.
Integrate technical knowledge and business understanding to create. solutions for customers.
Resolve single- and cross- technology incidents independently. Work with team members to resolve unusually complex or cross- technology incidents.
Proactively and reactively look for solutions to prevent problems from occurring in team/technology area.
Apply company solutions to meet highly complex customer needs.
Identify additional services that could lead to future service revenue growth.
Provide technical consulting during contract renewal discussions.
Build and maintain strong relationship up to senior management level in assigned accounts.
Design and deliver support solutions using specific industry knowledge and expertise.
Assist in managing delivery of industry support solutions.
Lead Customer Expectation management as part of escalation process.
Lead cross-team or large programs/projects.
Coach or guide junior consultants.
Knowledge and Skills:
Thorough knowledge of company products and services offerings, company organization, competition, third party products and market trends.
Broad knowledge of corporate organization, job, and policies.
Comprehensive business, technical or functional knowledge at an expert level.
Communicate tactfully with diplomacy up to senior management levels within an organization.
Active listening skills and ability to adjust messages to audience level.
Problem-solving skills (proactive, reactive and creative).
Able to employ exemplary consulting skills by becoming a trusted advisor to the customer and providing clarity to solution determination.
Well versed in core technical competencies and peaked in some technical area(s) intermediate skills in project management, communication, analysis and presentation.
Provide suggestions for operational efficiencies.

jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for Business Operations Lead Tunis HUB to join our team!
Lead and orchestrate operational excellence for the Global Technical Support Tunis HUB and Geos by driving governance, performance management, and transformation initiatives. Act as the strategic enabler and single point of accountability for operational processes, ensuring alignment with corporate objectives and bold goals. Deliver executive-level business reviews, foster collaboration across hubs, and champion innovation through automation, analytics, and continuous improvement to optimize customer experience and organizational performance.
How you will make your mark:
Operational Excellence & Governance
Deploy and measure Objectives and Key Results (OKRs) aligned with Business bold goals.
Define and track KPIs across Global Technical Support.
Drive performance reviews and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
Lead operational excellence through standardization, simplification, and automation of business processes.
Own HUB governance and policies, ensuring compliance and driving metrics leadership.
Enable end-to-end customer experience through analytics, insights, and dashboards.
Standardize processes, enforce compliance, and mitigate risks.
Collaborate with Ops Leads, SME s and hubs globally to ensure operational excellence.
Prepare and deliver Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs) and organizational performance reports for senior leadership.
Consolidate insights into clear, actionable narratives for executive decision-making.
Strategy, Planning & Transformation
Drive internal transformation projects across the organization.
Drive cost optimization and ROI tracking for transformation projects.
Drive financial discipline across the organization.
Build and lead current and future Cap-Cap models.
Ensure timely delivery of milestones and adoption of new processes.
Own and deploy the Organization s Plan of Record (PoR).
Contribute to strategic planning and governance frameworks that optimize operational performance.
Align resource planning with business priorities.
Align operational priorities with corporate objectives and transformation roadmaps.
Serve as the bridge between business strategy and execution, ensuring operational readiness for growth initiatives.
Promote collaboration across HPE Operations and hubs.
Innovation & Continuous Improvement
Champion innovation and automation initiatives to modernize operations.
Incubate ideas for process automation, AI-driven analytics, and digital transformation.
Identify opportunities for process optimization and digital transformation.
Drive operational maturity assessments and benchmark against industry best practices.

jobs.title: Salesforce Business Analyst
jobs.description_preview: The role involves analyzing business needs, documenting requirements, conducting testing, and improving Salesforce processes while collaborating with stakeholders and teams.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Position Overview:
The Salesforce Business Analyst is responsible for analyzing, translating, and documenting business needs to support the implementation and optimization of Salesforce-based platforms, including Equinox Corporate+ and Equinox Invention. Acting as a bridge between business and technology, this role ensures that functional requirements are clearly defined, and solutions are delivered to meet end-user expectations.
Principal Duties & Responsibilities:

Collaborate with internal stakeholders and Solution Engineers to gather, analyze, and document functional requirements

Translate business needs into user stories and define acceptance criteria for development and testing

Organize and lead functional testing campaigns and user acceptance testing (UAT) in sandbox and Trials environments

Coordinate with Salesforce administrators and developers on deployment activities, including Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git workflows

Validate successful implementation of new features, proactively monitor actions, and resolve any post-deployment issues

Identify opportunities for continuous improvement of Salesforce business processes and platform usability

Maintain user documentation and functional documentation and user guides to promote the adoption of implemented solutions

Participate in Agile ceremonies and ensure alignment between solutions and business priorities

Stay current on Salesforce platform developments and assess potential impact on current systems

Collaborate with cross-functional teams and R&D teams supporting the Orbit Invention platforms to support functional evolution and optimization

Work on special projects and other duties as assigned by management

Qualifications & Skills:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodation may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential function.
Education and Experience: Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field preferred; or any combination of education, experience and training which provides the following knowledge, skills and abilities:

Minimum 2 years of experience in Salesforce functional analysis and implementation required

Salesforce Business Analyst Certification preferred

Proficient in Salesforce native tools such as Flows, Validation Rules, and Custom Objects

Understanding of APEX and SOQL

Familiar with Salesforce Sandbox Management, Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git

Experience using tools such as JIRA, Confluence, and working within Agile/Scrum frameworks

Strong analytical, organizational, and documentation skills

Excellent verbal and written communication in English

Self-starter with the ability to work independently and collaboratively across teams

Effective at managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced, global environment

Adaptable, solutions-oriented and proactive in identifying improvements

This job description may evolve based on business needs.

jobs.title: Release Manager
jobs.description_preview: Responsible for planning and managing software releases, ensuring quality and coordination among teams, with expertise in SDLC, Agile, and CI/CD.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
As part of NeoXam s R&D department, the Release Manager is responsible for planning, coordinating, and managing DataHub software releases across multiple environments and projects. This role ensures smooth deployment of new features, enhancements, and fixes by aligning development, testing, and business teams. The Release Manager oversees the end-to-end release lifecycle from planning and build integration to testing, deployment, and post-release validation ensuring minimal disruption and maximum quality.
MISSION
Release Planning & Governance
Define, document, and manage the overall release calendar across multiple stakeholders.
Collaborate with product owners, development leads, and the QA team to identify release scope and dependencies.
Establish and maintain release governance standards, policies, and processes.
Coordination & Communication
Act as the central point of contact for all release-related activities and communications.
Facilitate release readiness reviews, go/no-go meetings, and post-release retrospectives.
Communicate release scope, milestones, and risks to all stakeholders.
Release Execution & Deployment
Coordinate build deployments and ensure version control, tagging, and release documentation are properly maintained.
Manage deployment pipelines (CI/CD) in collaboration with DevOps and Infrastructure teams.
Ensure rollback, recovery, and contingency procedures are in place and tested.
Quality & Risk Management
Monitor release quality by aligning with QA team on testing outcomes and defect tracking.
Identify potential risks and conflicts early in the release cycle and drive mitigation strategies.
Track release metrics (success rate, failure rate, deployment time, etc.) to improve future performance.
Automation & Continuous Improvement
Partner with DevOps to streamline and automate release processes where feasible.
Continuously review and enhance release processes for efficiency, predictability, and scalability.
PROFILE
Strong understanding of SDLC, Agile, DevOps, and CI/CD principles.
Excellent organizational and stakeholder management skills.
Hands-on experience with release tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, good to have Azure DevOps, or GitLab CI/CD.
Proven experience managing releases across multiple environments and teams (DEV, QA, UAT, PROD).
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Proven ability to work under pressure and manage multiple concurrent releases.
It s even better if you have :
Experience in regulated industries (finance, healthcare, etc.) with controlled release processes.
PMO, Agile/Scrum or ITIL certification(s)
Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
We are looking for a highly rigorous and persistent professional with excellent communication skills and the ability to drive and promote best practices across teams.
You will also bring a continuous improvement mindset and strong capabilities in risk management and issue resolution to support the team s performance and long-term success.
WHAT WE OFFER
A permanent contract (CDI).
A pleasant and collaborative work environment, where team spirit is key.
An attractive compensation package, including a fixed salary, performance bonus, meal vouchers, health and life insurance.
A flexible and hybrid work model, combining remote work and on-site presence.
And much more...

jobs.title: Software Integration Consultant
jobs.description_preview: Implement software integrations, analyze requirements, configure solutions, and document technical implementations while possessing strong analytical and communication skills.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Implement seamless software integrations,analyze requirements, draft specs, configure and develop solutions, connect REIS with client systems, model business rules, support deployment and document technical implementations.


About Vneuron and Reis RCS
Vneuron is a fast-growing RegTech company helping financial institutions stay ahead of compliance and risk challenges. Our solution, Reis RCS , supports banks and financial services in fighting financial crime through advanced technology.
In 2025, Vneuron was named among the Top Innovators in the FinCrimeTech50 and won the Best Compliance as a Service Solution at the RegTech Insight Awards Europe. Weve also been recognized in the RegTech100 for the fourth year in a row a global list of the most innovative companies in the field.
If youre looking to join a team thats making a real impact in the world of compliance and technology, Vneuron is the place to be.

Our Culture & Values
Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a pleasant and comfortable work environment. Our organization is collaborative and flat-structured. And, our management is available and present.
Moreover, We have a passionate and committed young team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly skilled experts willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a positive impact.
We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.

Why would you love to join us?
Challenging context to expand your technical and professional skills
Opportunity to start a promising career
Pleasant and comfortable work environment (Relaxation and play areas)
Work along with our passionate and brilliant Spark team
Highly qualified mentor to guide you through the realization of your project
Being surrounded by Highly skilled experts in different fields such as Software Architecture, Software Release Management, Software Quality Assurance, Project Management, Consulting, Selling, etc.
Equal opportunity no matter your gender, religion, culture, color, etc.

Responsibilities:
Analyze project requirements while considering the functionalities of the REIS suite.
Contribute to the drafting of technical specification documents.
Perform configurations and developments required for the implementation of technical and functional requirements.
Integrate and implement interfacing mechanisms between the REIS suite and the clients information system.
Model business rules and implement them in the REIS platform, following best practices.
Estimate the workload needed to complete the technical part of the project.
Provide support during the deployment and acceptance testing phases in the clients environment.
Write documentation for the implemented technical solutions.

Profile:
Having a degree in Computer Science, ideally with a component in Business Management.
Having strong analytical skills, allowing for effective modeling and optimal implementation of business needs.
Demonstrating rigor, method, and a solution-oriented mindset.
Possessing excellent communication abilities and ease in collaborative environments.
Being adaptable and able to perform well under pressure.
Good knowledge of JavaScript, Postman, Form.io, Freemarker, UML/BPMN, GitLab, SQL, and PostgreSQL.
Good mastery of data integration mechanisms and tools such as Talend/ETL and Spring Integration.
Proficient in Microsoft Office tools.

Benefits :
The opportunity to work on exciting projects that are generating a positive impact around the world.
Career Growth opportunity
Healthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your family
An evolving and pleasant environment where diversity is applauded, and success is celebrated.
Appropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doing
A winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing and Passion for what it does
Equal Employment Opportunities : Gender, religious, culture equity
Possibility to work remotely

Assist with the setup and day-to-day management of tools for vulnerability management and threat detection.

Join incident response reviews and help implement lessons learned to prevent future issues.
Explore new security tools and automation opportunities to help us stay ahead of threats.


Why Join Us?
Make an Impact: Youll help protect critical systems, data, and infrastructure from real-world threats.
Work with Modern Tools: We use the latest in cloud-native security, automation, and DevSecOps practices.

jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Family Definition:
Within the family there is a range of technical and managerial customer on-site functions. The family of jobs is focused on managing the onsite delivering of software services, pre-sales, post-sales or service delivery support, installation and configuration for customer environments. The jobs solve various business systems, networking and applications problems for standard industry servers, specialized or complex clustered environments. Deliver reactive and proactive activities according to Service Level Agreement to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty. Provides direct post-sales systems on site technical support for reactive and proactive customers. Each position maintains a high level of customer satisfaction by ensuring clear business and technical solution alignment, clarifying customer needs and ensuring that they are met. Jobs are responsible for company Total Customer Experience as well as the revenue growth, profitability, and account retention.
Management Level Definition:
Applies developed subject matter knowledge to solve common and complex business issues and recommends appropriate alternatives. Works on problems of diverse complexity and scope. May act as a team or project leader providing direction to team activities and facilitates information validation and team decision making process. Exercises independent judgment to identify and select a solution. Ability to handle most unique situations. May seek advice in order to make decisions on complex business issues.
Responsibilities:
Apply advanced technical knowledge to operate one or more technology areas (e.g. server administration, technical security management, performance management) or customer groups that are critical or high- risk.
Integrate technical knowledge and business understanding to create. solutions for customers.
Resolve single- and cross- technology incidents independently. Work with team members to resolve unusually complex or cross- technology incidents.
Proactively and reactively look for solutions to prevent problems from occurring in team/technology area.
Apply company solutions to meet highly complex customer needs.
Identify additional services that could lead to future service revenue growth.
Provide technical consulting during contract renewal discussions.
Build and maintain strong relationship up to senior management level in assigned accounts.
Design and deliver support solutions using specific industry knowledge and expertise.
Assist in managing delivery of industry support solutions.
Lead Customer Expectation management as part of escalation process.
Lead cross-team or large programs/projects.
Coach or guide junior consultants.
Knowledge and Skills:
Thorough knowledge of company products and services offerings, company organization, competition, third party products and market trends.
Broad knowledge of corporate organization, job, and policies.
Comprehensive business, technical or functional knowledge at an expert level.
Communicate tactfully with diplomacy up to senior management levels within an organization.
Active listening skills and ability to adjust messages to audience level.
Problem-solving skills (proactive, reactive and creative).
Able to employ exemplary consulting skills by becoming a trusted advisor to the customer and providing clarity to solution determination.
Well versed in core technical competencies and peaked in some technical area(s) intermediate skills in project management, communication, analysis and presentation.
Provide suggestions for operational efficiencies.

jobs.title: Salesforce Business Analyst
jobs.description_preview: The role involves analyzing business needs, documenting requirements, conducting testing, and improving Salesforce processes while collaborating with stakeholders and teams.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Position Overview:
The Salesforce Business Analyst is responsible for analyzing, translating, and documenting business needs to support the implementation and optimization of Salesforce-based platforms, including Equinox Corporate+ and Equinox Invention. Acting as a bridge between business and technology, this role ensures that functional requirements are clearly defined, and solutions are delivered to meet end-user expectations.
Principal Duties & Responsibilities:

Collaborate with internal stakeholders and Solution Engineers to gather, analyze, and document functional requirements

Translate business needs into user stories and define acceptance criteria for development and testing

Organize and lead functional testing campaigns and user acceptance testing (UAT) in sandbox and Trials environments

Coordinate with Salesforce administrators and developers on deployment activities, including Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git workflows

Validate successful implementation of new features, proactively monitor actions, and resolve any post-deployment issues

Identify opportunities for continuous improvement of Salesforce business processes and platform usability

Maintain user documentation and functional documentation and user guides to promote the adoption of implemented solutions

Participate in Agile ceremonies and ensure alignment between solutions and business priorities

Stay current on Salesforce platform developments and assess potential impact on current systems

Collaborate with cross-functional teams and R&D teams supporting the Orbit Invention platforms to support functional evolution and optimization

Work on special projects and other duties as assigned by management

Qualifications & Skills:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodation may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential function.
Education and Experience: Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field preferred; or any combination of education, experience and training which provides the following knowledge, skills and abilities:

Minimum 2 years of experience in Salesforce functional analysis and implementation required

Salesforce Business Analyst Certification preferred

Proficient in Salesforce native tools such as Flows, Validation Rules, and Custom Objects

Understanding of APEX and SOQL

Familiar with Salesforce Sandbox Management, Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git

Experience using tools such as JIRA, Confluence, and working within Agile/Scrum frameworks

Strong analytical, organizational, and documentation skills

Excellent verbal and written communication in English

Self-starter with the ability to work independently and collaboratively across teams

Effective at managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced, global environment

Adaptable, solutions-oriented and proactive in identifying improvements

This job description may evolve based on business needs.

jobs.title: Release Manager
jobs.description_preview: Responsible for planning and managing software releases, ensuring quality and coordination among teams, with expertise in SDLC, Agile, and CI/CD.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
As part of NeoXam s R&D department, the Release Manager is responsible for planning, coordinating, and managing DataHub software releases across multiple environments and projects. This role ensures smooth deployment of new features, enhancements, and fixes by aligning development, testing, and business teams. The Release Manager oversees the end-to-end release lifecycle from planning and build integration to testing, deployment, and post-release validation ensuring minimal disruption and maximum quality.
MISSION
Release Planning & Governance
Define, document, and manage the overall release calendar across multiple stakeholders.
Collaborate with product owners, development leads, and the QA team to identify release scope and dependencies.
Establish and maintain release governance standards, policies, and processes.
Coordination & Communication
Act as the central point of contact for all release-related activities and communications.
Facilitate release readiness reviews, go/no-go meetings, and post-release retrospectives.
Communicate release scope, milestones, and risks to all stakeholders.
Release Execution & Deployment
Coordinate build deployments and ensure version control, tagging, and release documentation are properly maintained.
Manage deployment pipelines (CI/CD) in collaboration with DevOps and Infrastructure teams.
Ensure rollback, recovery, and contingency procedures are in place and tested.
Quality & Risk Management
Monitor release quality by aligning with QA team on testing outcomes and defect tracking.
Identify potential risks and conflicts early in the release cycle and drive mitigation strategies.
Track release metrics (success rate, failure rate, deployment time, etc.) to improve future performance.
Automation & Continuous Improvement
Partner with DevOps to streamline and automate release processes where feasible.
Continuously review and enhance release processes for efficiency, predictability, and scalability.
PROFILE
Strong understanding of SDLC, Agile, DevOps, and CI/CD principles.
Excellent organizational and stakeholder management skills.
Hands-on experience with release tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, good to have Azure DevOps, or GitLab CI/CD.
Proven experience managing releases across multiple environments and teams (DEV, QA, UAT, PROD).
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Proven ability to work under pressure and manage multiple concurrent releases.
It s even better if you have :
Experience in regulated industries (finance, healthcare, etc.) with controlled release processes.
PMO, Agile/Scrum or ITIL certification(s)
Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
We are looking for a highly rigorous and persistent professional with excellent communication skills and the ability to drive and promote best practices across teams.
You will also bring a continuous improvement mindset and strong capabilities in risk management and issue resolution to support the team s performance and long-term success.
WHAT WE OFFER
A permanent contract (CDI).
A pleasant and collaborative work environment, where team spirit is key.
An attractive compensation package, including a fixed salary, performance bonus, meal vouchers, health and life insurance.
A flexible and hybrid work model, combining remote work and on-site presence.
And much more...

About Vneuron and Reis RCS
Vneuron is a fast-growing RegTech company helping financial institutions stay ahead of compliance and risk challenges. Our solution, Reis RCS , supports banks and financial services in fighting financial crime through advanced technology.
In 2025, Vneuron was named among the Top Innovators in the FinCrimeTech50 and won the Best Compliance as a Service Solution at the RegTech Insight Awards Europe. Weve also been recognized in the RegTech100 for the fourth year in a row a global list of the most innovative companies in the field.
If youre looking to join a team thats making a real impact in the world of compliance and technology, Vneuron is the place to be.

Our Culture & Values
Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a pleasant and comfortable work environment. Our organization is collaborative and flat-structured. And, our management is available and present.
Moreover, We have a passionate and committed young team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly skilled experts willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a positive impact.
We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.

Why would you love to join us?
Challenging context to expand your technical and professional skills
Opportunity to start a promising career
Pleasant and comfortable work environment (Relaxation and play areas)

Equal opportunity no matter your gender, religion, culture, color, etc.

Responsibilities:
Analyze project requirements while considering the functionalities of the REIS suite.
Contribute to the drafting of technical specification documents.
Perform configurations and developments required for the implementation of technical and functional requirements.
Integrate and implement interfacing mechanisms between the REIS suite and the clients information system.
Model business rules and implement them in the REIS platform, following best practices.
Estimate the workload needed to complete the technical part of the project.
Provide support during the deployment and acceptance testing phases in the clients environment.
Write documentation for the implemented technical solutions.

Profile:
Having a degree in Computer Science, ideally with a component in Business Management.
Having strong analytical skills, allowing for effective modeling and optimal implementation of business needs.
Demonstrating rigor, method, and a solution-oriented mindset.
Possessing excellent communication abilities and ease in collaborative environments.

Good mastery of data integration mechanisms and tools such as Talend/ETL and Spring Integration.
Proficient in Microsoft Office tools.

The family of jobs is focused on managing the onsite delivering of software services, pre-sales, post-sales or service delivery support, installation and configuration for customer environments. The jobs solve various business systems, networking and applications problems for standard industry servers, specialized or complex clustered environments. Deliver reactive and proactive activities according to Service Level Agreement to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty. Provides direct post-sales systems on site technical support for reactive and proactive customers. Each position maintains a high level of customer satisfaction by ensuring clear business and technical solution alignment, clarifying customer needs and ensuring that they are met. Jobs are responsible for company Total Customer Experience as well as the revenue growth, profitability, and account retention.
Management Level Definition:
Applies developed subject matter knowledge to solve common and complex business issues and recommends appropriate alternatives. Works on problems of diverse complexity and scope. May act as a team or project leader providing direction to team activities and facilitates information validation and team decision making process. Exercises independent judgment to identify and select a solution. Ability to handle most unique situations. May seek advice in order to make decisions on complex business issues.
Responsibilities:
Apply advanced technical knowledge to operate one or more technology areas (e.g. server administration, technical security management, performance management) or customer groups that are critical or high- risk.
Integrate technical knowledge and business understanding to create. solutions for customers.
Resolve single- and cross- technology incidents independently. Work with team members to resolve unusually complex or cross- technology incidents.
Proactively and reactively look for solutions to prevent problems from occurring in team/technology area.
Apply company solutions to meet highly complex customer needs.
Identify additional services that could lead to future service revenue growth.
Provide technical consulting during contract renewal discussions.
Build and maintain strong relationship up to senior management level in assigned accounts.
Design and deliver support solutions using specific industry knowledge and expertise.
Assist in managing delivery of industry support solutions.
Lead Customer Expectation management as part of escalation process.
Lead cross-team or large programs/projects.
Coach or guide junior consultants.
Knowledge and Skills:
Thorough knowledge of company products and services offerings, company organization, competition, third party products and market trends.
Broad knowledge of corporate organization, job, and policies.
Comprehensive business, technical or functional knowledge at an expert level.
Communicate tactfully with diplomacy up to senior management levels within an organization.
Active listening skills and ability to adjust messages to audience level.
Problem-solving skills (proactive, reactive and creative).
Able to employ exemplary consulting skills by becoming a trusted advisor to the customer and providing clarity to solution determination.
Well versed in core technical competencies and peaked in some technical area(s) intermediate skills in project management, communication, analysis and presentation.
Provide suggestions for operational efficiencies.

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for Business Operations Lead Tunis HUB to join our team!
Lead and orchestrate operational excellence for the Global Technical Support Tunis HUB and Geos by driving governance, performance management, and transformation initiatives. Act as the strategic enabler and single point of accountability for operational processes, ensuring alignment with corporate objectives and bold goals. Deliver executive-level business reviews, foster collaboration across hubs, and champion innovation through automation, analytics, and continuous improvement to optimize customer experience and organizational performance.
How you will make your mark:
Operational Excellence & Governance
Deploy and measure Objectives and Key Results (OKRs) aligned with Business bold goals.
Define and track KPIs across Global Technical Support.
Drive performance reviews and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
Lead operational excellence through standardization, simplification, and automation of business processes.
Own HUB governance and policies, ensuring compliance and driving metrics leadership.
Enable end-to-end customer experience through analytics, insights, and dashboards.
Standardize processes, enforce compliance, and mitigate risks.
Collaborate with Ops Leads, SME s and hubs globally to ensure operational excellence.

Consolidate insights into clear, actionable narratives for executive decision-making.
Strategy, Planning & Transformation

Build and lead current and future Cap-Cap models.

jobs.title: Salesforce Business Analyst
jobs.description_preview: The role involves analyzing business needs, documenting requirements, conducting testing, and improving Salesforce processes while collaborating with stakeholders and teams.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Position Overview:
The Salesforce Business Analyst is responsible for analyzing, translating, and documenting business needs to support the implementation and optimization of Salesforce-based platforms, including Equinox Corporate+ and Equinox Invention. Acting as a bridge between business and technology, this role ensures that functional requirements are clearly defined, and solutions are delivered to meet end-user expectations.
Principal Duties & Responsibilities:

Collaborate with internal stakeholders and Solution Engineers to gather, analyze, and document functional requirements

Translate business needs into user stories and define acceptance criteria for development and testing

Organize and lead functional testing campaigns and user acceptance testing (UAT) in sandbox and Trials environments

Coordinate with Salesforce administrators and developers on deployment activities, including Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git workflows

Validate successful implementation of new features, proactively monitor actions, and resolve any post-deployment issues

Identify opportunities for continuous improvement of Salesforce business processes and platform usability

Maintain user documentation and functional documentation and user guides to promote the adoption of implemented solutions

Participate in Agile ceremonies and ensure alignment between solutions and business priorities

Stay current on Salesforce platform developments and assess potential impact on current systems

Collaborate with cross-functional teams and R&D teams supporting the Orbit Invention platforms to support functional evolution and optimization

Work on special projects and other duties as assigned by management

Qualifications & Skills:
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodation may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential function.
Education and Experience: Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field preferred; or any combination of education, experience and training which provides the following knowledge, skills and abilities:

Minimum 2 years of experience in Salesforce functional analysis and implementation required

Salesforce Business Analyst Certification preferred

Proficient in Salesforce native tools such as Flows, Validation Rules, and Custom Objects

Understanding of APEX and SOQL

Familiar with Salesforce Sandbox Management, Change Sets, Salesforce CLI, and Git

Experience using tools such as JIRA, Confluence, and working within Agile/Scrum frameworks

Strong analytical, organizational, and documentation skills

Excellent verbal and written communication in English

Self-starter with the ability to work independently and collaboratively across teams

Effective at managing multiple priorities in a fast-paced, global environment

Adaptable, solutions-oriented and proactive in identifying improvements

This job description may evolve based on business needs.

jobs.title: Release Manager
jobs.description_preview: Responsible for planning and managing software releases, ensuring quality and coordination among teams, with expertise in SDLC, Agile, and CI/CD.
jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
As part of NeoXam s R&D department, the Release Manager is responsible for planning, coordinating, and managing DataHub software releases across multiple environments and projects. This role ensures smooth deployment of new features, enhancements, and fixes by aligning development, testing, and business teams. The Release Manager oversees the end-to-end release lifecycle from planning and build integration to testing, deployment, and post-release validation ensuring minimal disruption and maximum quality.
MISSION
Release Planning & Governance
Define, document, and manage the overall release calendar across multiple stakeholders.
Collaborate with product owners, development leads, and the QA team to identify release scope and dependencies.
Establish and maintain release governance standards, policies, and processes.
Coordination & Communication
Act as the central point of contact for all release-related activities and communications.
Facilitate release readiness reviews, go/no-go meetings, and post-release retrospectives.
Communicate release scope, milestones, and risks to all stakeholders.
Release Execution & Deployment
Coordinate build deployments and ensure version control, tagging, and release documentation are properly maintained.
Manage deployment pipelines (CI/CD) in collaboration with DevOps and Infrastructure teams.
Ensure rollback, recovery, and contingency procedures are in place and tested.
Quality & Risk Management
Monitor release quality by aligning with QA team on testing outcomes and defect tracking.
Identify potential risks and conflicts early in the release cycle and drive mitigation strategies.
Track release metrics (success rate, failure rate, deployment time, etc.) to improve future performance.
Automation & Continuous Improvement
Partner with DevOps to streamline and automate release processes where feasible.
Continuously review and enhance release processes for efficiency, predictability, and scalability.
PROFILE
Strong understanding of SDLC, Agile, DevOps, and CI/CD principles.
Excellent organizational and stakeholder management skills.
Hands-on experience with release tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, good to have Azure DevOps, or GitLab CI/CD.
Proven experience managing releases across multiple environments and teams (DEV, QA, UAT, PROD).
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Proven ability to work under pressure and manage multiple concurrent releases.
It s even better if you have :
Experience in regulated industries (finance, healthcare, etc.) with controlled release processes.
PMO, Agile/Scrum or ITIL certification(s)
Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
We are looking for a highly rigorous and persistent professional with excellent communication skills and the ability to drive and promote best practices across teams.
You will also bring a continuous improvement mindset and strong capabilities in risk management and issue resolution to support the team s performance and long-term success.
WHAT WE OFFER
A permanent contract (CDI).
A pleasant and collaborative work environment, where team spirit is key.
An attractive compensation package, including a fixed salary, performance bonus, meal vouchers, health and life insurance.
A flexible and hybrid work model, combining remote work and on-site presence.
And much more...

jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Implement seamless software integrations,analyze requirements, draft specs, configure and develop solutions, connect REIS with client systems, model business rules, support deployment and document technical implementations.


About Vneuron and Reis RCS
Vneuron is a fast-growing RegTech company helping financial institutions stay ahead of compliance and risk challenges. Our solution, Reis RCS , supports banks and financial services in fighting financial crime through advanced technology.
In 2025, Vneuron was named among the Top Innovators in the FinCrimeTech50 and won the Best Compliance as a Service Solution at the RegTech Insight Awards Europe. Weve also been recognized in the RegTech100 for the fourth year in a row a global list of the most innovative companies in the field.
If youre looking to join a team thats making a real impact in the world of compliance and technology, Vneuron is the place to be.

Our Culture & Values
Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a pleasant and comfortable work environment. Our organization is collaborative and flat-structured. And, our management is available and present.
Moreover, We have a passionate and committed young team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly skilled experts willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a positive impact.
We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.

Why would you love to join us?
Challenging context to expand your technical and professional skills
Opportunity to start a promising career
Pleasant and comfortable work environment (Relaxation and play areas)
Work along with our passionate and brilliant Spark team
Highly qualified mentor to guide you through the realization of your project
Being surrounded by Highly skilled experts in different fields such as Software Architecture, Software Release Management, Software Quality Assurance, Project Management, Consulting, Selling, etc.
Equal opportunity no matter your gender, religion, culture, color, etc.

Responsibilities:
Analyze project requirements while considering the functionalities of the REIS suite.
Contribute to the drafting of technical specification documents.
Perform configurations and developments required for the implementation of technical and functional requirements.
Integrate and implement interfacing mechanisms between the REIS suite and the clients information system.
Model business rules and implement them in the REIS platform, following best practices.
Estimate the workload needed to complete the technical part of the project.
Provide support during the deployment and acceptance testing phases in the clients environment.
Write documentation for the implemented technical solutions.

Profile:
Having a degree in Computer Science, ideally with a component in Business Management.
Having strong analytical skills, allowing for effective modeling and optimal implementation of business needs.
Demonstrating rigor, method, and a solution-oriented mindset.
Possessing excellent communication abilities and ease in collaborative environments.
Being adaptable and able to perform well under pressure.
Good knowledge of JavaScript, Postman, Form.io, Freemarker, UML/BPMN, GitLab, SQL, and PostgreSQL.
Good mastery of data integration mechanisms and tools such as Talend/ETL and Spring Integration.
Proficient in Microsoft Office tools.

Benefits :
The opportunity to work on exciting projects that are generating a positive impact around the world.
Career Growth opportunity
Healthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your family
An evolving and pleasant environment where diversity is applauded, and success is celebrated.
Appropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doing
A winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing and Passion for what it does
Equal Employment Opportunities : Gender, religious, culture equity
Possibility to work remotely

jobs.title: Cyber Security Analyst

jobs.full_description:
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
As a Cyber Security Analyst, you will:
Assist with the setup and day-to-day management of tools for vulnerability management and threat detection.
Help update and maintain security policies, procedures, and standards to stay compliant with best practices and regulations.
Support SIEM/SOAR operations by tuning alerts, adjusting rules, and working with DevOps on incident triage.
Take part in post-incident reviews to evaluate and improve our security controls.
Work closely with R&D and DevOps to ensure strong access controls, endpoint protection, and patch management.
Use tools like Microsoft Defender and Azure Security Center to help prioritize remediation efforts based on risk.
Contribute to the rollout and improvement of Zero Trust security initiatives.
Monitor logs across systems, firewalls, and applications to support timely detection and response to potential threats.
Participate in regular risk assessments, documenting findings and suggesting actionable improvements.
Join incident response reviews and help implement lessons learned to prevent future issues.
Explore new security tools and automation opportunities to help us stay ahead of threats.


Why Join Us?
Make an Impact: Youll help protect critical systems, data, and infrastructure from real-world threats.
Work with Modern Tools: We use the latest in cloud-native security, automation, and DevSecOps practices.
